You ever get board and rewrite lyrics to music. Parodies and what not?
 I do.
 
 Here's Land Split Asunder.
 
 I travel with my friends who love Kali
 In the land where once walked Gandhi
 I married a lady...with a dot on her forehead,
 She dance Bali for me when I am Bor-ed.
 
 I come from a land split asunder
 Hindi grow and bramin wander
 Can you wear, can you wear a turban
 Kama Sutra makes for a good lover.
 
 I eat my curry with truffles
 I pull my cart with a lot of hustle
 Dodging the bombs from the Kasmiri
 They kill a few of us but we got plenty.
 
 I come from a land split asunder
 Hindi grow and bramin wander
 Can you wear, can you wear a turban
 Kama Sutra makes for a good lover.
 
 I run a Kwik-E-Mart in Bombay
 Minimum wage there is good pay
 Would you like to buy a slushy
 Or maybe some opium to make you happy
 
 I come from a land split asunder
 Hindi grow and bramin wander
 Can you wear, can you wear a turban
 Kama Sutra makes for a good lover.
 
 
 
 Land Down Under by Men at Work.

Good one, Zardoz emoticon_xgood 
 
 Had me snickering....out loud. :p

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Land Split Asunder
